	var bandId = 3540375920;
	var bandName = "Pestlegion";
	var minRecScore = 3;
		
		
		
	$(document).ready(function() {
		$('.tabs, .tabs2lvl').tabs({ beforeLoad: cacheTab });
		$(".no-js").removeClass("no-js");
						$(document).on('click', '.albumMenu', toggleAlbumMenu);
				var browser = detectBrowser();
		if(browser.name == "webkit" && parseFloat(browser.version) < 536) {
			$('head').append( $('<style type="text/css">.releaseCol { width: 26%; }</style>'));
		}
	});

</script>

<div id="band_info">
<h1 class="band_name"><a href="https://www.metal-archives.com/bands/Pestlegion/3540375920">Pestlegion</a></h1>
<div class="clear block_spacer_5"></div>
<div id="band_stats">
<dl class="float_left">
<dt>Country of origin:</dt>
<dd><a href="https://www.metal-archives.com/lists/DE">Germany</a></dd>
<dt>Location:</dt>
<dd>Marl, North Rhine-Westphalia</dd>
<dt>Status:</dt>
<dd class="active">Active</dd>
<dt>Formed in:</dt>
<dd>2012</dd>
</dl>
<dl class="float_right">
<dt>Genre:</dt>
<dd>Black Metal</dd>
<dt>Lyrical themes:</dt>
<dd>Nordic themes, Demonology, War, Misanthropy, Anti-Religion</dd>
<dt>Current label:</dt>
<dd><a href="https://www.metal-archives.com/labels/Bret_Hard_Records/30179">Bret Hard Records</a></dd>
</dl>
<dl class="clear" style="width: 100%;">
<dt>Years active:</dt>
<dd>
		        			        				        		
		        			2012-present		        			        </dd>
</dl>
</div>
